definition: to withhold information/to keep sth secret
to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc

sentences.english: Here are a bunch of models from Uncharted that I worked on.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個模型，我的祕境工作的一羣。

sentences.english: Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
sentences.chinese: 祕耳焊工具有所有被它放逐之牌的所有起動式異能。

sentences.english: The Yoga repairs holds secret and important is a statute book which the theory and the time participate in government mutually.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈修持祕要是理論和時間互相參政的法典。

sentences.english: Take out that to throw from the breast to thousand if Xi, week after gentleman no longer lecture.
sentences.chinese: 從懷中掏出那封祕卷扔向千若兮，周繼君不再言語。

sentences.english: Slowly cooked beef with olive and tomatoes served with rice.
sentences.chinese: 慢煮牛肉，配祕製番茄沙司和青橄欖。

sentences.english: Come, run the hidden pine trails of the forest!
sentences.chinese: 來吧，到現祕的森林松講上跑跑。

sentences.english: For the rest of us, though, South Island is the world's best-kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 但是對我們其餘的人而言，南島是世界最棒的祕境。

sentences.english: A player on the sports team blew the whistle on the gambling scandal.
sentences.chinese: 體育隊的選手檢舉賭博弊案的祕辛。

sentences.english: The mysteries of learning English well are just practice and review frequently.
sentences.chinese: 學好英語的祕決就是經常實踐練習和複習。

sentences.english: Some of them are olive-green porcelain.
The "Snow Flower" producers hope they can change the trend.
sentences.chinese: 《雪花祕扇》的製片人希望他們能改變這個趨勢。

sentences.english: My favorite is the taro stem and duck.
sentences.chinese: 而我最喜歡的就是祕製芋頭莖釀鴨肉。

sentences.english: Po is Hong Kong's best kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 米埔是香港最好的祕居地。

sentences.english: The key function is enriching lung and kidney, beneficing pneuma.
Well, really, this is a very pretty little mystery.
sentences.chinese: 這真是一件非常有趣的小祕案。

sentences.english: Occasionally the eyes may get infected showing persistant greenish thick discharge.
sentences.chinese: 有時，眼睛更可能受到感染而出現綠色的分祕物。

definition: to exhort (sb) to live a virtuous life (Buddhism)/to beg for alms
to acclaim/to sing the praises of
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
